mapper.select: SELECT #{provinceId} AS province_id, p.area_name AS province_name, #{cityId} AS city_id, c.area_name AS city_name, #{districtId} AS district_id, d.area_name AS district_name, d.post_code FROM mall_area AS p, mall_area AS c, mall_area AS d WHERE p.id = #{provinceId} AND p.is_deleted = 0 AND c.id = #{cityId} AND c.parent_id = p.id AND c.is_deleted = 0 AND d.id = #{districtId} AND d.parent_id = c.id AND d.is_deleted = 0
